name: Pea Shooter
description:
A game created for GBJam 10!

You're a farmer defending his chickens from the hordes! Side-scrolling shooting action, except you have to use your plants do the fighting for you!

Can't kill these zombies with standard weapons... or even your seeds... only plants!

Controls:

Dpad to move

A to jump

X to shoot

Up on dpad to switch plants

(EDIT: I ran out of time in the jam, so a lot of stuff is not animated or as complete as I wanted, but figured I would upload what I have anyway. Hopefully you can still get what I was going for :p).

Also... I admittedly did not test with keyboard controls. So controls are a bit funky there... but here are controls for keyboard:

Arrow keys to move

Space to jump

Shift to fire

Up arrow to switch weapons
